flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this guide we will remove goo and stickers with common and nontoxic household materials.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this guide we will remove goo and stickers with common and nontoxic household materials.

Tools
  • Paper Towel
  • Q-tips
  • Vaseline

lines.text: First you need something to ungoo. I am using this Peanut Butter bottle for this demonstration.
lines.text_raw: First you need something to ungoo. I am using this Peanut Butter bottle for this demonstration.

lines.text: You should not try to remove the goo at this point.
lines.text_raw: You should not try to remove the goo at this point.

lines.text: Remove the sticker itself as much as possible.
lines.text_raw: Remove the sticker itself as much as possible.

lines.text: Use hot or warm water to remove the rest of the paper.
lines.text_raw: Use hot or warm water to remove the rest of the paper.

lines.text: Warning!                                                     If the object to be de-gooed is plastic, hot water may warp or melt it.
lines.text_raw: Warning!                                                     If the object to be de-gooed is plastic, hot water may warp or melt it.

lines.text: You can use a brush or the scrubbing part of a sponge to help remove the paper.
lines.text_raw: You can use a brush or the scrubbing part of a sponge to help remove the paper.

lines.text: This step is not necessary if the sticker comes off easily.
lines.text_raw: This step is not necessary if the sticker comes off easily.

lines.text: Now you will need some Q-tips, i.e., cotton swabs.
lines.text_raw: Now you will need some Q-tips, i.e., cotton swabs.

lines.text: A rag or sponge will work.
lines.text_raw: A rag or sponge will work.

lines.text: You will also need Vaseline or another grease/oil.
lines.text_raw: You will also need Vaseline or another grease/oil.

lines.text: Peanut butter or olive oil will also. Thanks, Todd Carter!
lines.text_raw: Peanut butter or olive oil will also. Thanks, [http://makeprojects.com/User/5775/Todd+Carter|Todd Carter]!

lines.text: Get a big glob of grease and smear it on that goo.
lines.text_raw: Get a big glob of grease and smear it on that goo.

lines.text: Scrub it with the paper towel.
lines.text_raw: Scrub it with the paper towel.

lines.text: The left side has been treated but the right side has not.
lines.text_raw: The left side has been treated but the right side has not.

guide.summary: Removing goo without Goo Gone, etc.
guide.title: Removing Goo and Stickers
